statements: SELECT * FROM GenomicVariations;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, position FROM GenomicVariations;
SELECT variant_id, gene_name, ref_allele, alt_allele FROM GenomicVariations WHERE population_frequency > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM GenomicVariations WHERE zygosity = 'homozygous' ORDER BY position ASC;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, population_frequency FROM GenomicVariations WHERE chromosome = 'X' ORDER BY population_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM GenomicVariations WHERE population_frequency > 0.5 ORDER BY chromosome DESC, position ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT variant_id, gene_name FROM GenomicVariations WHERE gene_name LIKE '%BRCA%' ORDER BY position ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT chromosome FROM GenomicVariations WHERE zygosity = 'heterozygous' ORDER BY chromosome;
SELECT gene_name, SUM(population_frequency) AS total_frequency FROM GenomicVariations GROUP BY gene_name HAVING total_frequency > 0.3 ORDER BY total_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM GenomicVariations WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND population_frequency BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY position DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM genomic_variations;
SELECT id, variation_name, chromosome FROM genomic_variations WHERE end_position > 1000;
SELECT gene_name, nucleotide_change FROM genomic_variations WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT * FROM genetic_diseases WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT id, disease_name, affected_gene FROM genetic_diseases WHERE affected_gene = 'BRCA1' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM genomic_variations WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT id, variation_name, gene_name FROM genomic_variations ORDER BY variation_name DESC;
SELECT disease_name, affected_gene FROM genetic_diseases WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, variation_name, chromosome, start_position, end_position, nucleotide_change, gene_name FROM genomic_variations WHERE gene_name LIKE 'BRCA%';
SELECT variation_name, chromosome, start_position, end_position, gene_name FROM genomic_variations WHERE start_position >= 500 AND end_position <= 1000;
SELECT * FROM genetic_variations;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome_number, variant_type FROM genetic_variations WHERE chromosome_number = 10;
SELECT DISTINCT gene_name FROM genetic_variations ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT id, variation_name, gene_name, position FROM genetic_variations WHERE variant_type = 'SNP' ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT disease_name, description FROM diseases WHERE diagnosis_age > 50;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome_number FROM genetic_variations WHERE variant_type = 'SNP';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT disease_name, description FROM diseases WHERE diagnosis_age < 18;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN genetic_variations ON patients.genetic_variation_id = genetic_variations.id;
SELECT DISTINCT gene_name FROM genetic_variations WHERE chromosome_number = 21;
SELECT * FROM Variations;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, variation_type FROM Variations WHERE position > 1000;
SELECT disease_name, related_gene, diagnostic_method FROM Diseases WHERE disease_name = 'Cancer';
SELECT study_name, researcher_name, study_date FROM Studies ORDER BY study_date DESC;
SELECT sample_name, gender, age FROM Samples WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Variations WHERE chromosome='X' AND variation_type='SNP';
SELECT sample_name, gender, age FROM Samples WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT disease_name, related_gene, diagnostic_method FROM Diseases WHERE disease_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name, study_date FROM Studies WHERE study_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY study_date ASC;
SELECT gene_name, position FROM Variations WHERE variation_type='Deletion' AND chromosome='Y';
SELECT * FROM Gene;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, start_position, end_position FROM Gene;
SELECT sample_id, patient_id, sample_type, collection_date FROM Sample;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, DOB, gender FROM Patient;
SELECT data_id, variation_id, sample_id, zygosity, data_value FROM VariationData;
SELECT * FROM Gene WHERE chromosome='X' ORDER BY start_position DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patient JOIN Sample ON Patient.patient_id = Sample.patient_id WHERE collection_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT gene_name, variation_type, impact_level FROM Gene INNER JOIN Variation ON Gene.gene_id = Variation.gene_id WHERE Variation.variation_type='SNP';
SELECT * FROM Sample WHERE sample_type='Blood' AND patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Patient WHERE gender='Female');

SELECT patient_name, collection_date, data_value FROM Patient JOIN Sample ON Patient.patient_id = Sample.patient_id JOIN VariationData ON Sample.sample_id = VariationData.sample_id WHERE VariationData.zygosity='Homozygous';
